introduction.name: Introduction
introduction.description: ذُكر في القرآن باسمه صراحة، وبحسب ابن كثير فإنه هو الملك الموكل بالمطر والنبات.

data.name: Allah
data.description: Muslims believe in one God, who is the creator of the universe and all that exists within it.

data.name: Angels
data.description: Muslims believe in the existence of angels, who are created beings made of light and who carry out God's commands.

data.name: prophets
data.description: Muslims believe that God sent messengers and prophets to guide humanity throughout history, including Adam, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and Muhammad, peace be upon them all.

data.name: Holy Scriptures
data.description: Muslims believe in the divine origin of the holy scriptures, including the Quran, the Torah, the Gospel, and the Psalms.

data.name: Day of judgment
data.description: Muslims believe in the concept of an afterlife and in the Day of Judgment, when all souls will be held accountable for their actions.

data.name: Divine Destiny
data.description: Muslims believe in the concept of divine destiny, or qadr, which holds that God has predetermined everything that will happen in the universe.
